tool_description: Performs text-based keyword search across journal entries with relevance scoring and search options.

keywords.description: List of keywords or phrases to search for

case_sensitive.description: Whether search should be case sensitive

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

error_messages: Empty keywords: At least one keyword must be provided
Invalid max_results: Must be between 1 and 100
Keywords too short: Each keyword must be at least 2 characters long
usage: Provide keywords array and optionally set search_mode, case_sensitive, and max_results. Results are ranked by relevance score.

entry_ids.description: List of matching entry IDs ranked by relevance

relevance_scores.description: Relevance scores (0-1) corresponding to each entry

total_matches.description: Total number of entries containing the keywords

search_summary.description: Summary of search parameters and results
